name: 4 for the Money Demo
description: 4 for the Money is a fast-paced, side-scrolling action/platformer featuring gameplay and graphics resembling the greats of the NES era. Except you don't need a Four Score to play 4-player! Sit down alone or with a pack of friends and jump in for the action!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP 3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space Sound Card: Any
